name: Head&Bat
description:
You play as a zombie and hit your own head with a baseball bat to kill enemies.

Controls

Move - WASD

Hit - Left Mouse Button

Credits

3D, Animation, Code - Sandebru - https://sandebru.itch.io/

Music - KIS - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCASJgNy7MZi_QtdSy-PEWyw

Art, Code and Music in game are all made within 10 days
